author.document: @username Don't take their abuse Bestune - you are CRAZY_BUSY! Even I can clearly see that. Ignore the haters - they don't know you

WHY I SUB: ME:You are NOT an ATHEIST-stop trying to side-track me. KID: How do YOU know? Me: For one thing, your name is Jesus. KID: True.
@username I will miss you!!! Come home safe and sound - come to 102 the MINUTE you roll back into town. I love you, BB <3 Debsky
@username John's"Once again,Mrs. S, I AM SO SORRY! PLEASE BELIEVE ME IT IS JOHN!....He's moving soon- so East TN will smell like Mid TN
@username @username As always, girls - Keepin' it Classy! I'm sure your mothers are so proud.

@username @username I KNOW that's right!
@username Corona in a can. Classy.
@username @username ps-who do you think taught her to drop, pop and lock it?? You're not just BORN knowing that stuff!
@username -I love you too!! I'm not really crazy-I just get so excited when I see/talk to @username -can't wait to hang with you girls
@username @username @username This kind of makes me DOUBT you when you firmly denied seeing that movie!!! You are grounded!
I like my Martial Arts MIXED.

@username Why were you running late to work? Did YOUR MOM'S CAR GET TOWED AGAIN?! Sorry those pesky little college students are in your way

That Justin Bieber can really dance.
@username @username Why don't you two Super Cool girls go to your regular hang-out, the Library, and try to pick up some Freshmen Bio majors?
@username Am I wrong to be fooled by the rocks that you got?
@username @username good luck on your future careers and job interviews, Ladies! #classy - that's right, I just did my first hashtag. Bam.
@username Skeeter! Since you love your mother and are coming home, could I get you to drop by for & take to my precious one in Chatt?
@username @username UNTWEET-UNTWEET! AND GO HOME NOW- THIS IS YOUR MOTHER TALKING- GO HOME AND DIG OUT COLLEGE RULES AND RE-STUDY THEM - NOW!
@username @username Much more important than anything you two have found -is reuniting that famous BRAIN TRUST and figuring out my CRAZY spots
@username @username Please remember that discretion is the better part of valor-very imp. here, ladies! KD, pls explain that to KT! haha ilu
@username @username Are you coming home this weekend? Oh-and that message made me miss you more!
@username Are you in Franklin still? What time do you head back to Chatt?
@username WHAT? That is straight up Skangsta! You haven't lost it :) (Did anybody come here that I know-going back today?)
@username Are you with Austin??? I need to send a couple of things to JohnnyBoy with him to Chatt if possible!! _Also - yay for KD!
@username Ok. OH! - KT told me about KD - I had no idea! I know you will love it and will make so many good friends there.
@username I think Rachel is telling me you are in Fr. headed to Chatt today? True? I'm Aus's BFF (not RV) & need to send pk to Aus!
@username I saw JB was "fighting big cats" this wkend - did you "slay"anything??? Would love a pic w/you and your catch! <3 You Kylie!!!
@username I wish JB had Twitter- if nothing else, so I could get you to hack in and post for him, "Justin Bieber is the reason I smile"-fun
@username I just read that JB got a Twitter account!! I can't believe it :)
@username @username Now I am a little afraid the world might really end in 2012!!! Go Mocs!
@username What shoes are you wearing for Taylor Swift's appearance on VMA's tonight, y'all?!
missing my girls- @username , @username , @username , @username , @username , @username - What's up, Ladies?
@username Hey! Did you guys go to knoxville today? Big Fun had by all?
@username Hey Alan! Would you please p.m. me or text me Susan's phone number? Need her and can't find number!!!
@username YOU ROCK!
@username HEY MON - hit me up with your schedule 4 the next few days - please!! - trying to make my calendar and you-know-who is VIP #1
@username Like visiting the Fam?? I bet they were thrilled :)
@username I'm sorry - I have no idea what you are talking about???!!??? You obviously have me confused in your mind with someone else!
@username AWESOME, PARTY PANTS!!!!! Now BREATHE... but only a little- then get right back on it!! :)
@username if you can remember where JB used to live - stop by and bring me a couple of shirts- I am inspired by your effort and love!
@username Are you and Terr-Bear Beefin' again?
@username Do they need any other interns there?- tell them I'm SLIGHTLY older, mature and #partypants is not part of my twitter name:)
@username @username @username What is up? You ok? - just getting your arm checked, I hope!... OR-are you getting tired of stairs?
@username Your biggest baby brother-his shirt says it ALL - and -duh, we knew that! Isn't he so cute?! #AllProsNoCons http://t.co/khc3EmAt
@username You better stay away! I can't write what he is saying about you guys-TRASH TALK like crazy-it is pretty ugly-u know how he gets!
@username Oh boy- I can't wait! You two are going to have to take it outside if punches are thrown!!
@username Terr-Bear found his "gift" from you - AFTER SCHOOL!!!!!! Nice.

@username You really can't imagine!!! Wish you were here to share it with:)
